to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: php5 and mail problems?
body:
Hello list,
I just upgraded to php5, by demand of linux.
Anyawy, mail seems to have broken.
Anyone had this problem?
Thanks,
